templates.name: SDXL - Text to Image
templates.description: The essential SDXL workflow. High-quality generation from prompt with optimized settings for best performance.
templates.author: UmeAiRT

templates.name: SDXL - Image to Image
templates.description: Transform existing images with SDXL. Includes denoising strength controls to balance creativity and structure.
templates.author: UmeAiRT

templates.name: SDXL - Inpainting
templates.description: Seamlessly modify specific parts of your image. Uses standard inpainting techniques to fix or change details.
templates.author: UmeAiRT

templates.name: SDXL - Outpainting
templates.description: Extend your canvas beyond the original borders. Perfect for changing aspect ratios or adding background context.
templates.author: UmeAiRT

templates.name: SDXL - ControlNet
templates.description: Advanced workflow integrating ControlNet adapters (Canny, Depth, etc.) to guide the generation structure.
templates.author: UmeAiRT

templates.name: SDXL - LoRA Tester
templates.description: Utility workflow designed to quickly test and compare different LoRA models and strengths.
templates.author: UmeAiRT
